thread.title: Sidharth Malhotra all smiles after 'insane' and 'awesome' New Zealand holiday
thread.title_full: Sidharth Malhotra all smiles after 'insane' and 'awesome' New Zealand holiday

author: Deccan
title: Sidharth Malhotra all smiles after 'insane' and 'awesome' New Zealand holiday
text:
Deccan Chronicle | October 14, 2015, 12.49 pm Mumbai: Sidharth Malhotra’s whirl winding trip to in New Zealand has finally come to an end. The actor was spotted at the Mumbai airport last evening returning home after a short 4-day vacation to the country as India’s tourism ambassador. The New Zealand government made sure to give Sid the royal treatment as he toured the country and visited popular sightseeing spots and tried out various adventure sports. During his short stay, he visited Auckland’s Sky Tower, went sailing on a hot air balloon in Queenstown and also went sky diving. He took to Twitter to share a picture from his dive with a message that read: One Insane!awesome! epic! thing off my bucket list: skydiving in New Zealand! #NZMustDo #SidNZ @NzoneSkydive Must Do Sidharth will be seen next in the film 'Baar Baar Dekho' opposite Katrina Kaif.
